title: Chic Southbank Melbourne Stay Near NGV with Onsite Cafe
description:
Perfectly positioned, this stylish hotel offers easy access to the city's cultural hotspots including the National Gallery of Victoria and the Arts Centre Melbourne. A short stroll will lead you to the bustling South Melbourne Market, where you can savour fresh produce from hundreds of artisan stalls, all while soaking in the lively atmosphere of this local gem.

At base, enjoy a freshly brewed coffee and an array of buffet breakfast delights at the onsite Distrikt Press Cafe. The rest of Melbourne is at your fingertips with Federation Square and Flinders Street Station just 5 minutes away, making it easy to explore everything this dynamic city has to offer.
